segment.source: The Domain Delegation tab on the Change Control pane provides a list of Group Policy administrators who have domain-level access to the archive and indicates the roles of each.
segment.target: The Domain Delegation tab on the Change Control pane provides a list of Group Policy administrators who have domain-level access to the archive and indicates the roles of each.

segment.source: Additionally, this tab enables AGPM Administrators (Full Control) to configure domain-level permissions for Editors, Approvers, Reviewers, and other AGPM Administrators.
segment.target: Additionally, this tab enables AGPM Administrators (Full Control) to configure domain-level permissions for Editors, Approvers, Reviewers, and other AGPM Administrators.

segment.source: There are two sections on the Domain Delegation tab—configuration of e-mail notification and role-based delegation for Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) at the domain level.
segment.target: There are two sections on the Domain Delegation tab—configuration of e-mail notification and role-based delegation for Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) at the domain level.

segment.source: The e-mail notification section of this tab identifies the Approvers that will receive notification when operations are pending in AGPM.
segment.target: The e-mail notification section of this tab identifies the Approvers that will receive notification when operations are pending in AGPM.

segment.source: The AGPM alias from which notification is sent to Approvers.
segment.target: The AGPM alias from which notification is sent to Approvers.

segment.source: In an environment with multiple domains, this can be the same alias throughout the environment or a different alias for each domain.
segment.target: In an environment with multiple domains, this can be the same alias throughout the environment or a different alias for each domain.

segment.source: A comma-delimited list of e-mail addresses of Approvers to whom notification is to be sent
segment.target: A comma-delimited list of e-mail addresses of Approvers to whom notification is to be sent

segment.source: The name of the e-mail server, such as mail.contoso.com
segment.target: The name of the e-mail server, such as mail.contoso.com

segment.source: A user with access to the SMTP server
segment.target: A user with access to the SMTP server

segment.source: User's password for authentication to the SMTP server
segment.target: User's password for authentication to the SMTP server

segment.source: The role-based delegation section of this tab displays and enables an AGPM Administrator to delegate allowed, denied, and inherited permissions for each group and user on the domain with access to the archive.
segment.target: The role-based delegation section of this tab displays and enables an AGPM Administrator to delegate allowed, denied, and inherited permissions for each group and user on the domain with access to the archive.

segment.source: An AGPM Administrator can configure domain-wide permissions using either standard AGPM roles (Editor, Approver, Reviewer, and AGPM Administrator) or a customized combination of permissions for each Group Policy administrator.
segment.target: An AGPM Administrator can configure domain-wide permissions using either standard AGPM roles (Editor, Approver, Reviewer, and AGPM Administrator) or a customized combination of permissions for each Group Policy administrator.

segment.source: Add a new entry to the security descriptor.
segment.target: Add a new entry to the security descriptor.

segment.source: Any users or groups in Active Directory can be added as Group Policy administrators.
segment.target: Any users or groups in Active Directory can be added as Group Policy administrators.

segment.source: Remove the selected Group Policy administrators from the Access Control List.
segment.target: Remove the selected Group Policy administrators from the Access Control List.

segment.source: Display the properties for the selected Group Policy administrators.
segment.target: Display the properties for the selected Group Policy administrators.

segment.source: Open the Access Control List Editor.
segment.target: Open the Access Control List Editor.

segment.source: For information about roles and permissions related to specific tasks, see the tasks under Performing AGPM Administrator Tasks, Performing Editor Tasks, Performing Approver Tasks, and Performing Reviewer Tasks.
segment.target: For information about roles and permissions related to specific tasks, see the tasks under Performing AGPM Administrator Tasks, Performing Editor Tasks, Performing Approver Tasks, and Performing Reviewer Tasks.

segment.source: User Interface: Advanced Group Policy Management
segment.target: User Interface: Advanced Group Policy Management
